email.subject: $P{keyWordCompany}: $P{EntityTypeParent} $P{ParentName} has been related.
email.message:
THIS IS AN AUTOMATED MESSAGE, DO NOT REPLY.

The following item has been changed. The changes are listed below. For full information about what has changed, visit the $P{urlCompany} and locate this object.

Object Name: $P{EntityTypeParent} "$P{ParentName}"
User who did this: $P{CreatedBy}
Changed Event: The $P{EntityTypeParent} $P{ParentName} has been related with $P{EntityTypeChild} $P{ChildName}.

If you did not expect this message or don't want to receive mails in future, please contact $P{emailOriginalAdmin}.

This is an automated message. Please do not reply.
